name: Lost Alice / Shall we date?
description:
◆From the creators of Otome games for FREE with ≪32 million DLs≫ comes the newest competitor, Lost Alice!
Open the door of destiny to Wonderland and let the classic characters of the immortal masterpiece, Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland, amaze you. The Hatter? Cheshire Cat? Or other characters? Take your pick! Who will you choose to shape your future with?
◆WHAT’S AN OTOME GAME?
You’re the heroine -- Otome -- in these simulation games, who will experience the sweetest moments with hot men. Just tap your way through these large-scale love story games! It’s easier than reading a visual novel and different from either anime, manga or romance novels but are just as enjoyable on your devices!
◆ABOUT LOST ALICE
“You’ve come here, neither following the White Rabbit nor in response to the Queen of Hearts.
You’ve come to Wonderland on your own will.”
--The key to solving all the mysteries is your lost memories.
“My Alice, I’ve been waiting for you for so long.”
“I told you, I’m not Alice!”
--You remember nothing but your name. They call you Alice.
Elegant tea party with the Hatter. Temptations from the Cheshire Cat. The golden afternoon with Joker. While the days in Wonderland never cease to entertain you...you find your true love.
Whose “Alice” will you be?
◆WONDROUS MEN THAT WILL FALL IN LOVE WITH YOU:
Luke Estheim - The Hatter
“You don’t have to worry, about anything...”
This quiet and mysterious gentleman calls you by your name, not “Alice”, unlike the other residents of Wonderland. Luke keeps a secret, along with his sad yet passionate feelings for you...
His secret lies in your lost memories.
Kyle Knock - Cheshire Cat
“The only one I want to touch, to have smile at me is you, my Alice.”
Possessing a charming pair of cat ears and a tail, Kyle seduces you with a mesmerizing smile. He takes the role of the guide of Wonderland, while acting overly affectionate. You can’t understand the reasons behind it at first, but once you get to know why he had been waiting for an “Alice” more than anyone else, you will understand your feelings for him, too!
Joker Braze - Role unknown
“To think that we would be reunited here...it must be fate tying us together.”
Wielding magic with his playing cards and playing with others with his words, this badboy takes a liking on you and, before you know it, you must go on your adventure with him. As your bond deepens, you notice that Joker and you have something in common.
